description: Candidates explain their views on travel links and the States-owned airline.
title: Guernsey Election 2020: Travel connectivity and Aurigny
title_page: Guernsey Election 2020: Travel connectivity and Aurigny - BBC News
maintext: Sasha Kazantseva-Miller, from The Guernsey Partnership of Independents, said: "The new States should complete the review of Aurigny, air and sea links and the runway extension business case as soon as possible.
